ai-iti10:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti10:2.1_0: “Mendicants, without directly knowing and completely understanding hate, without dispassion for it and giving it up, you can’t end suffering.
ai-iti10:2.2_0: By directly knowing and completely understanding hate, having dispassion for it and giving it up, you can end suffering.”
ai-iti10:3.2_0: sentient beings go to a bad place,
ai-iti10:3.5_0: They give up food and drink,
ai-iti10:3.6_0: in this world with its gods.”
ai-iti10:4.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
ai-iti10:4.3_0: The first sub-chapter on demonstrations is finished.
ai-iti10:5.3_0: From conceit and desire come to be,
ai-iti10:5.4_0: and made clear the first offender.
